about.title: About CosBE
about.heading: An AI transformation company creating the future
about.message: CosBE's mission is to accelerate corporate business transformation by utilizing cutting-edge AI technology. We do not simply provide technology; we aim to be a partner that deeply understands our customers' business challenges and creates the future together. With the power of AI, we will provide society with unprecedented value and possibilities.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We will help close the AI gap and empower small and medium-sized business owners to accelerate transformation by leveraging AI in their management and business.
vision.imageAlt: Vision of the future with AI

event2.title: Released Hayaku AI Lab

event3.title: Focusing on AI transformation

globalTeam.title: Global One Team
globalTeam.subtitle: CosBE operates without any barriers around the world and supports our customers.
globalTeam.teamTitle: CosBE's all-remote team, creating the future together
globalTeam.description1: He is a veteran consultant who has advised business leaders in 16 countries and 32 industries around the world, a former entrepreneur who has been active in Japan, the US, Thailand, Nepal, and other countries, an AI researcher recognized by international academic societies, and an IT engineer who has developed a variety of software in the US, the UK, and India.
globalTeam.description2: Furthermore, we have business partners all over the world, including Japan, the US, the UK, India, Thailand, China, Bangladesh, Bulgaria, Indonesia, Canada, Brazil, and Estonia.
globalTeam.description3: We are an all-remote, global team with members from all over the world working together to bring our challengers' visions to life.

hero.title: Concrete AI results in just 2 months
hero.subtitle: From "Can AI solve this?" to a working MVP that proves value
hero.description: Hayaku AI Lab is a rapid AI experimentation lab for executives who want to move from ideas to concrete results fast. In as little as two months, we turn your AI concepts into working services, validate them with real data, and create a foundation for full-scale rollout.
hero.imageAlt: Visual of AI brain connected to digital infrastructure

offerings.title: What you can do with Hayaku AI Lab
offerings.description: We design and build AI solutions that directly connect to management and business outcomes. Here are three representative projects realized through Hayaku AI Lab.

resume.label: HR / Talent
resume.title: Generate Japanese resumes from English CVs
resume.description: Automatically convert English resumes from overseas candidates into Japanese-style resumes, dramatically reducing screening time for global hiring.
resume.result: 90% faster document screening for overseas applicants
resume.imageAlt: Slide showing generation of Japanese resumes from English CVs

trainingAgent.label: Training / HR Development
trainingAgent.title: Training support AI agent
trainingAgent.description: An AI agent that supports in‑house training by answering questions, creating exercises, and providing personalized feedback, even when professional instructors are scarce.
trainingAgent.result: 80% reduction in preparation time for training programs
trainingAgent.imageAlt: Slide describing training support AI agent

newBusiness.label: New Business
newBusiness.title: Make new business concrete in 2 months
newBusiness.description: From idea discovery to MVP release, we support you in concretizing and testing new AI businesses in a short period with small, low‑risk starts.
newBusiness.result: From concept to AI service MVP in about 2 months
newBusiness.imageAlt: Slide stating new business realized in 2 months

flow.title: From management issues to AI MVP in 3 steps
flow.description: We proceed in small, fast cycles so that executives can see concrete results while minimizing risk.
flow.imageAlt: Graph showing business growth supported by AI

step1.title: Clarify issues and define hypotheses
step1.description: We interview management and on‑site members to identify issues worth solving with AI and define hypotheses for what an MVP should verify.

step2.title: Develop and iterate the MVP
step2.description: We rapidly build an AI prototype, connect it with your actual data and operations, and iteratively refine it based on feedback.

step3.title: Measure results and design the next step
step3.description: We measure concrete effects, summarize learnings, and design the roadmap toward full‑scale rollout or additional use cases.

step1.title: Clarify issues and define hypotheses
step1.description: Understand your business and define what we want to prove with AI in this project.

step2.title: Develop and iterate the AI MVP
step2.description: Quickly build and improve an AI prototype that can be tried by the actual team.

step3.title: Measure results and plan expansion
step3.description: Evaluate business impact and decide on the path to full‑scale implementation.

ctaSection.title: Turn your "someday" AI ideas into concrete results now
ctaSection.description: If you have even a rough idea such as "Could AI help with this?", please feel free to talk with us. Together we will design an AI MVP that is realistic for your organization and create visible results within a short time frame.

hero.title: Hayaku AI Lab
hero.subtitle: AI-Specialized Agile Development Service "Hayaku AI Lab"
hero.description1: Hayaku AI Lab is a service that rapidly develops prototypes of products and services utilizing AI.
hero.description2: For example, it's ideal for companies and entrepreneurs who have concerns such as "I have an idea for a new AI app but don't know how to create it" or "I'm thinking of an AI-powered service but can't move forward because we don't have experts."
hero.description3: By teaming up with our customers, we can achieve flexible and rapid development, with AI consultants who are knowledgeable about new businesses and world-class AI engineers.

challenge1.title: Not enough time to prepare requirements specifications etc.
challenge1.description: You are struggling to identify the appropriate improvement measures because it is unclear which part of your business needs improvement and what specific steps you should take. You want to move on to the next phase after obtaining proof of concept and budget/funding, but for various reasons, time just seems to be passing by.

challenge2.title: Lack of resources and knowledge regarding AI technology and app development
challenge2.description: We want to introduce and utilize AI and app development, but we lack specialized personnel within the company, and we are concerned about selecting and communicating with external resources. We are finding it difficult to assign engineers suitable for development, and we are keenly aware of our lack of knowledge and experience regarding AI.

challenge3.title: Budget Concerns
challenge3.description: I'm worried because I can't get an accurate estimate of how much agile development will cost. I want to create an MVP to explain to stakeholders, but I'm not sure what to verify with my limited budget.

transition.text: will help you solve these problems.

features.title: Features of "Hayaku AI Lab," an agile development service specializing in AI

feature1.title: Quickly turn ideas into reality
feature1.description: We can start development immediately from your idea, without the hassle of creating a requirements specification document, and provide you with an MVP as quickly as possible.

feature2.title: The world's leading AI consultant
feature2.description: Our AI consultants, who have extensive business and AI knowledge, and our global AI engineers, who are well versed in cutting-edge AI technology, will provide strong support for lean and agile development in both business and product areas.

feature3.title: Development at the lowest possible cost
feature3.description: Since development is done by narrowing down the requirements in a short period of time, it can be carried out with the minimum necessary budget.

benefits.title: "Hayaku AI Lab," an agile development service specializing in AI

benefit1.title: Realize your ideas in as little as two months! Quickly turn your ideas into reality.
benefit1.point1: We can start development immediately from your idea, without the hassle of creating a requirements specification document, and provide you with an MVP as quickly as possible.
benefit1.point2: Rapid agile development allows development steps to be carried out while being verified, leading to improved work efficiency and a significant reduction in unnecessary development costs.
benefit1.point3: We will support your ideas and ensure a quick start that differentiates you from your competitors.

benefit2.title: The secret to speedy development : "AI LaaS"
benefit2.point1: "AILaaS" stands for AI Laboratory as a Service. We provide a service that acts as your company's AI laboratory.
benefit2.point2: Just as knowledgeable researchers use cutting-edge experimental equipment in a real laboratory and conduct trial and error daily,
benefit2.point2Bold: Hayaku AI Lab will develop prototypes of your services within CosBE's well-equipped development environment.
benefit2.point3: Our AI consultants will propose an MVP based on your idea, and our AI engineers will quickly develop the first product. During your time at the Hayaku AI Lab, we will work with you to actually operate and improve the product, verifying your idea.

benefit3.title: The best price for "development and consulting" at the lowest possible cost
benefit3.point1: We provide consistent support from consulting to development. Since we focus on requirements in a short period of time, we can implement the project with the minimum budget required.
benefit3.point2: We offer quality that exceeds expectations while keeping prices low.
benefit3.point3: Even first-time customers can place an order with confidence.

aiAgent.title: AI Agents
aiAgent.subtitle: AI will carry out tasks autonomously, and humans will focus on maximizing added value that AI cannot provide.
aiAgent.intro1: "I want to introduce AI, but it seems like it will be difficult to operate..."
aiAgent.intro2: "AI Agent" is the answer to such concerns of business managers.
aiAgent.agentDescription: An AI agent is a partner that autonomously perceives, judges, and acts.
aiAgent.agentDetail1: We flexibly build dedicated AI to support on-site operations, such as responding to inquiries, forecasting inventory, and supporting decision-making, in accordance with a company's objectives and operations.
aiAgent.agentDetail2: We will resolve the labor shortages and inefficiencies that are issues in a wide range of industries, including construction, retail, and manufacturing, and simultaneously achieve business improvement and cost reduction.

problems.title: Do you have any of these concerns?
problems.item1: I want to embark on a new initiative (DX or business expansion), but I'm unsure where to start.
problems.item2: We understand the importance of human resource shortages and streamlining operations, but we are constantly being asked for help from the field.
problems.item3: Because the IT department is not well-equipped, it is difficult to determine how much to spend on AI implementation.
problems.item4: I want to regain my perspective as a top executive. I want to delegate miscellaneous tasks and spend more time focusing on strategic decisions and new developments.

aiAgent.ctaConsult: Get a free consultation about introducing AI

whatIs.title: What are AI agents?
whatIs.subtitle: AI will autonomously carry out tasks and give back "truly valuable work" to managers
whatIs.point1: AI Agent is an "autonomous" AI system that utilizes internal data and existing systems to automatically generate and execute required tasks.
whatIs.point2: Instead of the CEO having to give all the instructions, AI will take over routine tasks and make decisions on the ground, ultimately supporting the CEO to make only the "important decisions."

step1.title: Data Formatting
step1.description: AI acquires internal business data and document information and automatically formats it into an easy-to-use format.

step2.title: Situation analysis
step2.description: The AI agent analyzes the situation based on the information and automatically identifies the tasks that need to be performed.

step3.title: decision making
step3.description: Execute the identified tasks and issue instructions to the person in charge. The processing results are automatically reported.

step4.title: Implementation support
step4.description: Managers can use AI-generated reports to make important decisions and take next steps.

industries.title: Implementation image and benefits
industries.description: In particular, by having AI agents support the desk work of white-collar workers, such as administrative professionals, high-class personnel will be able to focus on areas where they can demonstrate their value as people, such as communication.

construction.title: construction industry
construction.problem1: The site supervisor is overwhelmed with the enormous amount of paperwork and reporting required.
construction.problem2: On-site progress and trouble reports are subjective, which delays understanding the overall situation.
construction.solution1: Multiple AI agents work together to provide powerful support for construction management, including an AI agent that executes process planning and management, and an AI agent that creates daily reports through voice dialogue.
construction.solution2: Supports multiple input formats such as photos, videos, and audio, and minimizes process downtime with weather forecasts and preventive maintenance of equipment and goods.
construction.benefit1: Site supervisors can significantly reduce overtime hours and focus on safety management and quality control, which are their primary focus.
construction.benefit2: This allows for quicker response to problems and rework, leading to shorter overall construction times and improved management quality.

retail.title: Retail
retail.problem1: Store management tasks still rely on paper, fax, and other personnel, and the work is highly dependent on individuals.
retail.problem2: However, due to the intensifying competition for talent, there is a shortage of store staff and managers, and managers are being forced to take on positions even if they lack the skills.
retail.solution1: AI agents on customers' devices improve the customer experience by guiding them to stores and providing recommendations.
retail.solution2: AI agents assist store managers with management tasks such as optimal staffing, shift management, and product management based on store visit predictions.
retail.benefit1: UX that improves both customer satisfaction and in-store customer service capacity
retail.benefit2: Overcoming the shortage of store managers and supervisors and the lack of skills

manufacturing.title: manufacturing industry
manufacturing.problem1: Risk of not being able to take over design, quality control, and other tasks that are highly dependent on experienced personnel due to aging
manufacturing.problem2: There seems to be a lot of waste due to bottleneck processes such as waste in production schedules and in-process inventory that have not been resolved.
manufacturing.solution1: AI agents also assist skilled workers in processes such as design and quality control
manufacturing.solution2: AI will provide powerful support to factory managers in areas such as production schedule management, shift management, inventory optimization, and preventative maintenance of machinery based on demand forecasts.
manufacturing.benefit1: Individual AI apps and AI agents autonomously carry out and assist with tasks that depend on individual skills
manufacturing.benefit2: Factory executives focus on future strategies based on digital data

features.title: Features of the "Soku AI Lab" AI Agent
features.subtitle: Achieving both quick implementation and flexible expansion. An AI agent that supports top management strategies.

feature1.title: Agile development that allows prototyping in as little as two months
feature1.description: No need for extensive requirements definition. Even with limited resources, you can start small and quickly.
feature1.point1: Reduce investment risk and see results in a short period of time
feature1.point2: It's easy to share your vision of success within the company

feature2.title: Nested AI agents make it easy to add features later
feature2.description: Small-scale AIs work together, flexibly responding to business expansion and changes
feature2.point1: Even as a company grows, it can proceed with DX in stages without undergoing large-scale system modifications.

feature3.title: Reinforcement learning UI that grows the more you use it
feature3.description: Even though the AI is still in the learning stage at first, it can be entrusted with tasks little by little.
feature3.point1: Adjust course based on results and steadily expand AI use
feature3.point2: By effectively linking the workplace with AI, we can raise the productivity of the entire organization.

feature4.title: Support with an emphasis on business perspective
feature4.description: We not only provide support for IT implementation, but also provide consulting services with an eye on business strategies and profit generation.
feature4.point1: Custom development tailored to your company → Avoid wasteful IT investments that don't fit your goals
feature4.point2: Post-implementation support and additional development are also provided on an ongoing basis.

deployment.title: Implementation process
deployment.description1: Our AI agent implementation starts with very simple initial requirements, and we build a working prototype (MVP) in as little as two months.
deployment.description2: This short-term prototyping will allow us to quickly gather feedback from the field, and from the third month onwards we will improve the accuracy and usability of the AI and add new functions based on actual operational data.
deployment.description3: Ultimately, through these improvements, we will develop a system that can be stably operated across the company, creating an environment in which management can focus on strategic decision-making.

pricing.title: Information on installation costs
pricing.description: Hayaku AI Lab provides consistent support to maximize your business impact, with an optimal price design that allows you to start small.
pricing.feeNote: (Development, consulting, server, and various tool costs included *Minimum 2 months)
pricing.maintenanceNote: (Depending on the product, such as number of users and usage)

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How much does it cost to deploy an AI agent?
faq.a1: An MVP (minimum functionality initial product) can be developed in 2 months (3 million yen) or more.
faq.q2: How much does it cost to operate monthly?
faq.a2: If you run it in the CosBE cloud environment, it will cost from 50,000 yen/month (depending on the load).
faq.q3: How long will it take to get started?
faq.a3: As we will be working in an agile style, implementation will take as little as two months.
faq.q4: Is it really possible to implement AI even if there are no personnel with AI expertise in-house?
faq.a4: No in-house AI expertise is required. Because of our agile approach, AI knowledge is acquired naturally as the project progresses.
faq.q5: I'm concerned about the security of having AI agents handle my company's confidential data. Is there a risk of data leakage?
faq.a5: Depending on your company's security requirements, we will determine the cloud security level and build a local LLM within your company's closed environment.
faq.q6: How long will it take to see results after installation?
faq.a6: For a minimal product, understanding gradually increases from the third month of use. In cases where development has continued for about six months, the effects are clearly noticeable.
faq.q7: How cost-effective can you expect it to be?
faq.a7: It depends on the scale of your problem. The more work that is done by humans using paper or computers, the greater the effect can be expected.

kando.title: [Case Study] Solving the problem of a lack of professional instructors!

section1.title: Background of the issue
section1.subtitle: Difficulty in securing professional instructors restricts company growth
section1.challenge1: KANDO faced the challenge of finding professional instructors.
section1.challenge2: Specifically, there were not enough instructors and training that required multiple interviews could not be scaled up, which resulted in increased work hours and limited the company's sales capacity.
section1.challenge3: As a result, the company's growth became too dependent on people, which became a major bottleneck in management.

companyInfo.title: Company Information
companyInfo.name: Company name
companyInfo.challengesValue: Increased work hours, limited sales capacity, lack of instructors, and training operations dependent on people

section2.title: Solution Overview
section2.subtitle: Improving instructor productivity with AI agents
section2.description: "Hayaku AI Lab" is a system that utilizes an interactive AI agent to streamline the "pre-preparation" stage before training participants consult with instructors, significantly reducing the burden on instructors.
section2.feature1Item1: We have introduced an AI agent based on a large-scale language model (LLM) and refined requests and issues through repeated dialogue with users.
section2.feature2Item1: Organizing user thoughts through dialogue with AI
section2.feature2Item2: AI agents present multiple options and suggestions
section2.feature2Item3: Optimize the number of meetings with the instructor by clarifying the training theme and objectives in advance
section2.note: Initially, development began with the goal of creating an AI that could do the same things as the company president, but through trial and error, its role evolved into an agent that would maximize the strengths of instructors. Thanks to our flexible development structure, we welcomed changes even during the project and increased its value through actual user experiences.

section3.title: Benefits of implementation
section3.benefit1Description: The pre-training interview process, which previously required multiple exchanges, can now be completed in just two exchanges. This reduces instructors' working hours and allows them to focus on more advanced consulting and instruction.
section3.benefit2Title: Make the most of your instructors' expertise
section3.benefit2Description: By interacting with an AI agent beforehand, students can organize their thoughts, allowing instructors more time to provide advanced expertise.
section3.benefit3Description: The functionality has grown significantly from what was initially envisioned, and a model for selling the AI agent itself as a separate service is now in sight. This flexible project approach is creating new business opportunities for both our clients and our company.
section3.keyPointsIntro: KANDO introduced "Hayaku AI Lab" to prepare for corporate training and achieved the following benefits:
section3.keyPoint1: Participants can freely consult with the AI, allowing for thorough advance preparation.
section3.keyPoint2: Previously, one instructor would conduct multiple pre-interviews, but this has now been reduced to one or two.
section3.keyPoint3: Instructors can now focus on highly specialized areas, improving the quality of the training itself.

section4.title: Summary
section4.paragraph1: "Hayaku AI Lab" solved KANDO's problem of a lack of professional instructors and achieved the great result of doubling training productivity.
section4.paragraph2: Going forward, we will continue to provide flexible AI solutions that meet the changing needs and business ideas of our customers, supporting their corporate growth and new value creation.
section4.ctaText: Why not improve your business efficiency with AI?

author.title: The author of this article
author.name: Kenjiro Momi
author.bio: After obtaining his CPA qualification while studying at the School of Commerce at Waseda University, he worked for 18 years at Deloitte Tohmatsu, providing advisory services to top management. He then served as Representative Director of Toyoko for approximately five years, helping the company grow into a global enterprise. In 2022, he founded the US corporation CosBE Inc., and is currently engaged in activities to support business leaders.

cosbe.title: [Case Study] Solving the document screening issues of foreign resumes!

section1.title: Background of the issue
section1.subtitle: Challenges posed by diverse resume formats in overseas recruitment
section1.challenge1: Our company (CosBE) employs foreign talent in our global management division. However, resume formats are not standardized overseas, and it was common for application documents to be 100 to 200 pages long.
section1.challenge2: This meant that our recruiters had to spend a huge amount of time checking documents each time, which reduced work efficiency and increased the risk of making incorrect selections.
section1.challenge3: Furthermore, translating information into Japanese and organizing it required a lot of time and effort, putting pressure on the work that recruiters should be doing. Therefore, we decided to develop and implement 'Fast AI Lab' in-house to solve this problem.

companyInfo.title: Company Information
companyInfo.name: Company name
companyInfo.locationValue: 3 East Third Ave, San Mateo, CA, USA
companyInfo.challengesValue: Inefficient job application screening, inconsistent resumes, language barriers

section2.title: Solution Overview
section2.subtitle: Automatically convert foreign language resumes into standard Japanese formats
section2.description: Our 'Fast AI Lab' streamlines recruitment operations using the following process:
section2.feature1Item1: Automatically extracts necessary information (name, academic background, work history, skills, etc.)
section2.feature2Item1: The extracted information is translated into Japanese, converted into a standard format, and output immediately.
section2.feature2Item2: This allows recruiters to view each resume in the same style.
section2.feature2Item3: Even if the person in charge is not confident in their English, they can grasp the main points in Japanese, making it possible to conduct document screening accurately and in a short amount of time.
section2.note: This allows recruiters to view each resume in the same style. Furthermore, even if the person in charge is not confident in their English, they can grasp the main points in Japanese, making it possible to conduct document screening accurately and in a short amount of time.

section3.title: Benefits of implementation
section3.benefit1Title: Document review time reduced from several days to about one hour
section3.benefit1Description: Previously, it took several days to review the resumes of around 100 applicants, but after the implementation, batch processing by AI has made it possible to complete the process in about an hour.
section3.benefit2Title: Reduced burden on staff and improved quality of recruitment work
section3.benefit2Description: Even staff who are not good at English can easily grasp important information, which has significantly reduced stress. This frees up time for more value-added tasks, such as interviews and training.
section3.benefit3Title: Expand your company's know-how externally and acquire leads
section3.benefit3Description: We are also offering this solution free of charge to external parties, in the hopes of meeting the needs of other companies with similar challenges and creating new business opportunities.
section3.keyPointsIntro: We provide this AI agent for free to convert English resumes into Japanese resumes. Please take this opportunity to try it out.
section3.keyPoint1: The time it takes for hiring managers to review documents has been reduced from several days to about one hour.
section3.keyPoint2: Staff burden reduced and recruitment quality improved.
section3.keyPoint3: Know-how expanded externally to acquire new leads.

section4.title: Summary
section4.paragraph1: The newly developed and implemented 'Hayaku AI Lab' has solved a major issue for the Global Management Division of our company, namely document screening for foreign recruitment, shortening the selection process from several days to just one hour. This has enabled recruitment staff to focus on more strategic tasks, contributing to the global expansion of the company as a whole.
section4.paragraph2: This function has the potential to convert not only resumes but also various other documents into a unified format. For example, it could convert purchase orders that have different formats for each client into a single unified format. We provide flexible AI solutions that meet customer needs, so please feel free to contact us if you have any problems.
section4.ctaText: Why not improve your business efficiency with AI?

author.title: The author of this article
author.name: Kenjiro Momi
author.bio: After obtaining his CPA qualification while studying at the School of Commerce at Waseda University, he worked for 18 years at Deloitte Tohmatsu, providing advisory services to top management. He then served as Representative Director of Toyoko for approximately five years, helping the company grow into a global enterprise. In 2022, he founded the US corporation CosBE Inc., and is currently engaged in activities to support business leaders.

2month-ai-mvp.title: [Implementation Case] AI service realized in 2 months! Speed and small start create new business potential

section1.title: Background of the issue
section1.subtitle: Need for rapid market validation
section1.challenge1: The client needed to validate a new AI-based business idea quickly before making significant investments.
section1.challenge2: Traditional development approaches would take 6-12 months and require substantial upfront costs.
section1.challenge3: The risk of building a full-scale product without market validation was too high.

companyInfo.title: Company Information
companyInfo.name: Company name
companyInfo.challengesValue: Need for speed, budget constraints, market uncertainty, minimal viable product approach

section2.title: Solution Overview
section2.subtitle: Rapid MVP development in 2 months
section2.description: We developed a minimum viable product (MVP) in just 2 months, allowing the client to test their business concept with real users quickly.
section2.feature1Item1: Leveraged pre-trained AI models to accelerate development
section2.feature2Item2: Focus on core features only for MVP
section2.note: Our approach prioritized speed and learning over perfection, allowing the client to validate their business idea with minimal risk and investment.

section3.title: Benefits of implementation
section3.benefit1Description: The client was able to launch their service in just 2 months, gaining valuable market insights early.
section3.benefit2Description: By building an MVP first, the client avoided unnecessary features and reduced initial investment by 80%.
section3.benefit3Description: Real user feedback confirmed market demand, giving confidence for further investment and development.
section3.keyPointsIntro: Key outcomes of the rapid MVP approach:
section3.keyPoint1: Launched in just 2 months with core features
section3.keyPoint3: Validated market demand with real user feedback

section4.title: Summary
section4.paragraph1: The 2-month MVP approach allowed the client to validate their AI business idea quickly and cost-effectively.
section4.paragraph2: This case demonstrates the power of rapid prototyping and iterative development in AI projects.
section4.ctaText: Start your AI project with a rapid MVP

caseStudy2MonthAI.title: [Implementation Case] AI Service Launched in 2 Months! Speed and a Small Start Create New Business Potential

meta.description: We introduce a small-start case study that shaped a new AI-based service in just 2 months. Here are the key points for accelerating development and completing an MVP flexibly and quickly using the approach of 'building while thinking' without being constrained by requirements definition.
meta.keywords: AI Transformation, MVP, RAG, LLM, New Business

introduction.title: Introduction: Challenges in AI implementation and solutions
introduction.paragraph1: 'We want to use AI in a new business, but development takes too long...' 'The requirements haven't been finalized, and the project isn't moving forward...'
introduction.paragraph2: There are many companies that have such concerns. Company S, which we will introduce here, was also facing exactly this issue.
introduction.paragraph3: However, by taking a small-start approach of 'first making something that works,' they were able to complete a prototype of their AI service in just two months, and quickly bring it to market.
introduction.paragraph4: Let's take a closer look at how this was achieved.

overview.title: Overall Overview: Project Success Factors
overview.intro: The greatest feature of this case is that a new business idea was realized as an AI service in just two months.
overview.description: It is not uncommon for AI implementation to take several months to over a year. However, Company S was able to successfully develop a prototype in a short period of time by focusing on the following three points:
factors: Speed of initial response: Business validation can be carried out early, and feedback can be gathered quickly from both inside and outside the company.
Flexible requirement changes: Brush up on ideas while creating something that 'just works'
Utilizing AI technology (RAG x LLM): Automatically generate highly accurate content with minimal input

mvpDefinition.title: What is an MVP (Minimum Viable Product)?
mvpDefinition.description: A prototype that implements only the minimum necessary functions. It is useful in the early stages of a new business where testing and improvement are repeated.

issuesBackground.title: Issues and Background: Current Status and Issues of AI Implementation

speedIsKey.title: Speed is key in this new business
speedIsKey.paragraph1: Recently, new services that utilize AI have been emerging one after another, and for companies and organizations trying to enter the market later, the key is 'how quickly they can release a prototype.'
speedIsKey.paragraph2: However, there are also some common challenges, such as:
challenges: Delays in defining requirements: The newer the idea, the fewer definite items there are, and time is wasted just considering it.
Internal and external coordination costs: The more people involved in a project, the more time it takes to get approvals and communicate.
Technical unknowns: The AI field evolves rapidly, so specifications are likely to change during development.
speedIsKey.clientSituation: The client in this case had a strong desire to quickly create a solution and get user feedback, but was troubled by the uncertainty of the requirements and the adjustment process.

companyInfo.title: Company information
companyInfo.keyChallenges: Uncertain requirements, internal and external coordination costs, and technical unknowns

approach.title: A successful approach to development in a short period of time
approach.intro: In a new business, the very question of 'how far the business will go' is an unknown. With the traditional method of starting development only after solidifying all requirements, there is a risk that work will stall at the specification formulation stage.
approach.paragraph: Therefore, the following policy was adopted for this project:
policies: Minimum viable product (MVP) release in 2 months
Rather than aiming for perfect specifications, the first priority was to complete a working prototype
Try out prototypes and improve them in real time

ragLlm.title: Utilizing RAG×LLM and its effects
ragLlm.intro: The core technology of the AI service developed in this case is an automatic text generation function that combines RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) and LLM (Large Language Model).
ragLlm.mainFlow: The main flow is as follows:
steps: The user enters the minimum required information
RAG finds and extracts relevant data sources
LLM generates sentences based on the extracted information and integrates them into the content
ragLlm.conclusion: By combining highly accurate language models and search technology, we aimed to design a system that could quickly output text and content that is valuable to users.
definitions: What is RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation)? It is a system that extracts relevant information from a specified database and combines it with sentence generation.
What is an LLM (Large Language Model)? An AI model that learns from large amounts of text and performs highly accurate natural language processing.

results.title: Implementation Results: Project Impact and Results

prototype.title: A working prototype completed in two months
prototype.paragraph1: By prioritizing 'something that at least works' even when all the requirements were not met, they succeeded in creating a prototype AI service in just two months. The greatest achievement was that they were able to release it without compromising on 'speed,' which is the most important factor in new business.
prototype.paragraph2: The key point is that this has been significantly shortened, as in the past it could have taken several months just to define the requirements.

smallStart.title: Start small to reduce risk
smallStart.paragraph1: If we proceed with large-scale development all at once, there is a greater risk that the finished product will not meet our expectations. By starting small and testing an MVP first in the market and internally, we were able to significantly reduce the risk of investing too much in unnecessary features.
smallStart.paragraph2: Another advantage is that you can collect real reactions from users at the MVP stage, which makes it easier to clarify future directions.

flexibleImprovement.title: Flexible improvement cycle
flexibleImprovement.paragraph: Unexpected new ideas and bug fixes were smoothly implemented even in the middle of development. By leaving room in the development process, we have a system in place that ensures that innovative ideas that arise along the way are not overlooked.

summary.title: Summary: Putting ideas into practice in a short space of time
summary.intro: Starting small and thinking while you're creating is an approach that's particularly suited to areas with many uncertainties, such as new businesses and AI projects. By keeping the following points in mind, you can speed things up more effectively.
keyPoints: Don't expect 100% perfection from the start. Release early and conduct field tests.
Creating a system that allows for quick response to specification changes and additional requests through a short-term feedback loop
Creating a system that produces results with minimal input, such as utilizing RAG×LLM, which actively incorporates AI technology
summary.conclusion1: In this case study, we introduced the process of quickly turning a customer's idea into a prototype that can be tested in the market.
summary.conclusion2: Even in a project with many uncertainties, the bold policy of 'creating an MVP in two months' proved effective, and we were able to successfully release a highly refined prototype while minimizing risk.
summary.conclusion3: We hope that these examples will provide hints for companies and organizations developing AI services to achieve both speed and flexibility.

cta.title:
We support your business from various perspectives.
Please feel free to contact us first.
cta.description1: For detailed service inquiries and estimates, please use the form.
cta.description2: We respond flexibly according to your situation, so please feel free to contact us.

collecting.title: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.description: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:

items.name: First name and last name
items.address: Address, State, Province, ZIP/Postal code, City

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.description1: Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service.
usageData.description2: Usage Data may include information such as Your Device's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that You visit, the time and date of Your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
usageData.description3: When You access the Service by or through a mobile device, We may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device You use, Your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of Your mobile device, Your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser You use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.

tracking.title: Tracking Technologies and Cookies
tracking.description: We use Cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on Our Service and store certain information. Tracking technologies used are beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze Our Service. The technologies We use may include:

cookies.title: Cookies or Browser Cookies.
cookies.description: A cookie is a small file placed on Your Device. You can instruct Your browser to refuse all Cookies or to indicate when a Cookie is being sent. However, if You do not accept Cookies, You may not be able to use some parts of our Service. Unless you have adjusted Your browser setting so that it will refuse Cookies, our Service may use Cookies.

webBeacons.title: Web Beacons.
webBeacons.description: Certain sections of our Service and our emails may contain small electronic files known as web beacons (also referred to as clear gifs, pixel tags, and single-pixel gifs) that permit the Company, for example, to count users who have visited those pages or opened an email and for other related website statistics (for example, recording the popularity of a certain section and verifying system and server integrity).

cookieTypes.description: Cookies can be "Persistent" or "Session" Cookies. Persistent Cookies remain on Your personal computer or mobile device when You go offline, while Session Cookies are deleted as soon as You close Your web browser.
cookieTypes.useBoth: We use both Session and Persistent Cookies for the purposes set out below:

necessary.title: Necessary / Essential Cookies
necessary.purpose: Purpose: These Cookies are essential to provide You with services available through the Website and to enable You to use some of its features. They help to authenticate users and prevent fraudulent use of user accounts. Without these Cookies, the services that You have asked for cannot be provided, and We only use these Cookies to provide You with those services.

acceptance.title: Cookies Policy / Notice Acceptance Cookies
acceptance.purpose: Purpose: These Cookies identify if users have accepted the use of cookies on the Website.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.purpose: Purpose: These Cookies allow us to remember choices You make when You use the Website, such as remembering your login details or language preference. The purpose of these Cookies is to provide You with a more personal experience and to avoid You having to re-enter your preferences every time You use the Website.

performance.title: Tracking and Performance Cookies
performance.purpose: Purpose: These Cookies are used to track information about traffic to the Website and how users use the Website. The information gathered via these Cookies may directly or indirectly identify you as an individual visitor. This is because the information collected is typically linked to a pseudonymous identifier associated with the device you use to access the Website. We may also use these Cookies to test new pages, features or new functionality of the Website to see how our users react to them.

cookieTypes.moreInfo: For more information about the cookies we use and your choices regarding cookies, please visit our Cookies Policy or the Cookies section of our Privacy Policy.

useOfData.title: Use of Your Personal Data
useOfData.description: The Company may use Personal Data for the following purposes:

purposes.provide: To provide and maintain our Service, including to monitor the usage of our Service.
purposes.manage: To manage Your Account: to manage Your registration as a user of the Service. The Personal Data You provide can give You access to different functionalities of the Service that are available to You as a registered user.
purposes.contract: For the performance of a contract: the development, compliance and undertaking of the purchase contract for the products, items or services You have purchased or of any other contract with Us through the Service.
purposes.contact: To contact You: To contact You by email, telephone calls, SMS, or other equivalent forms of electronic communication, such as a mobile application's push notifications regarding updates or informative communications related to the functionalities, products or contracted services, including the security updates, when necessary or reasonable for their implementation.
purposes.news: To provide You with news, special offers and general information about other goods, services and events which we offer that are similar to those that you have already purchased or enquired about unless You have opted not to receive such information.
purposes.requests: To manage Your requests: To attend and manage Your requests to Us.
purposes.transfers: For business transfers: We may use Your information to evaluate or conduct a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Our assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which Personal Data held by Us about our Service users is among the assets transferred.
purposes.other: For other purposes: We may use Your information for other purposes, such as data analysis, identifying usage trends, determining the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns and to evaluate and improve our Service, products, services, marketing and your experience.

sharing.description: We may share Your personal information in the following situations:
sharing.serviceProviders: With Service Providers: We may share Your personal information with Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service, for payment processing, to contact You.
sharing.businessTransfers: For business transfers: We may share or transfer Your personal information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of Company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of Our business to another company.
sharing.affiliates: With Affiliates: We may share Your information with Our affiliates, in which case we will require those affiliates to honor this Privacy Policy. Affiliates include Our parent company and any other subsidiaries, joint venture partners or other companies that We control or that are under common control with Us.
sharing.partners: With business partners: We may share Your information with Our business partners to offer You certain products, services or promotions.
sharing.users: With other users: when You share personal information or otherwise interact in the public areas with other users, such information may be viewed by all users and may be publicly distributed outside.
sharing.consent: With Your consent: We may disclose Your personal information for any other purpose with Your consent.

retention.title: Retention of Your Personal Data
retention.description1: The Company will retain Your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use Your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.
retention.description2: The Company will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage Data is generally retained for a shorter period of time, except when this data is used to strengthen the security or to improve the functionality of Our Service, or We are legally obligated to retain this data for longer time periods.

transfer.title: Transfer of Your Personal Data
transfer.description1: Your information, including Personal Data, is processed at the Company's operating offices and in any other places where the parties involved in the processing are located. It means that this information may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of Your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from Your jurisdiction.
transfer.description2: Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by Your submission of such information represents Your agreement to that transfer.
transfer.description3: The Company will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that Your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of Your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of Your data and other personal information.

business.title: Business Transactions
business.description: If the Company is involved in a merger, acquisition or asset sale, Your Personal Data may be transferred. We will provide notice before Your Personal Data is transferred and becomes subject to a different Privacy Policy.

lawEnforcement.title: Law enforcement
lawEnforcement.description: Under certain circumstances, the Company may be required to disclose Your Personal Data if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities (e.g. a court or a government agency).

otherLegal.title: Other legal requirements
otherLegal.description: The Company may disclose Your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to:

items.protect: Protect and defend the rights or property of the Company
items.prevent: Prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service
items.safety: Protect the personal safety of Users of the Service or the public

security.title: Security of Your Personal Data
security.description: The security of Your Personal Data is important to Us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect Your Personal Data, We cannot guarantee its absolute security.

serviceProviders.title: Detailed Information on the Processing of Your Personal Data
serviceProviders.description: The Service Providers We use may have access to Your Personal Data. These third-party vendors collect, store, use, process and transfer information about Your activity on Our Service in accordance with their Privacy Policies.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: We may use third-party Service providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service.

emailMarketing.title: Email Marketing
emailMarketing.description: We may use Your Personal Data to contact You with newsletters, marketing or promotional materials and other information that may be of interest to You. You may opt-out of receiving any, or all, of these communications from Us by following the unsubscribe link or instructions provided in any email We send or by contacting Us.

payments.title: Payments
payments.description: We may provide paid products and/or services within the Service. In that case, we may use third-party services for payment processing (e.g. payment processors). We will not store or collect Your payment card details. That information is provided directly to Our third-party payment processors whose use of Your personal information is governed by their Privacy Policy. These payment processors adhere to the standards set by PCI-DSS as managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands like Visa, Mastercard, American Express and Discover. PCI-DSS requirements help ensure the secure handling of payment information.

links.title: Links to Other Websites
links.description1: Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us. If You click on a third party link, You will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise You to review the Privacy Policy of every site You visit.
links.description2: We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.

changes.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.description1: We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
changes.description2: We will let You know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy.
changes.description3: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us:
contact.website: By visiting this page on our website:

cta.title:
We support your business from various perspectives.
Please feel free to contact us first.
cta.description1: For detailed service inquiries and estimates, please use the form.
cta.description2: We respond flexibly according to your situation, so please feel free to contact us.
